title: Amid Biden Drop-Out Buzz, Kamala Harris' Balancing Act
content: US Vice President Kamala Harris is engaged in a delicate balancing act, playing cheerleader for President Joe Biden while standing by as a leading contender to replace him if he ends his reelection bid.
summary: US Vice President Kamala Harris is engaged in a delicate balancing act, playing cheerleader for President Joe Biden while standing by as a leading contender to replace him if he ends his reelection bid.

title: Joe Biden's Childhood Hometown "Embarrassed" By Debate Meltdown
content: As residents of Joe Biden's hometown, Scranton prepared to mark that most American of holidays -- July 4 -- many were also voicing alarm about the US president following his disastrous debate last week against Donald Trump.
summary: As residents of Joe Biden's hometown, Scranton prepared to mark that most American of holidays -- July 4 -- many were also voicing alarm about the US president following his disastrous debate last week against Donald Trump.

title: Voting Begins In UK, Rishi Sunak's Fate On The Line
content: Britons headed to the polls Thursday in a general election widely expected to emphatically return the opposition Labour party to power and end nearly a decade-and-a-half of Conservative rule.
summary: Britons headed to the polls Thursday in a general election widely expected to emphatically return the opposition Labour party to power and end nearly a decade-and-a-half of Conservative rule.

title: UK General Election 2024: When And Where To Watch LIVE Coverage
content: The United Kingdom is on the brink of a significant political shift as the country votes today. Labour Party leader Keir Starmer is heavily favoured to win a historic mandate in the general election.
summary: The United Kingdom is on the brink of a significant political shift as the country votes today. Labour Party leader Keir Starmer is heavily favoured to win a historic mandate in the general election.

title: McDonald's Australia Adjusts Breakfast Hours Amid Bird Flu Outbreak
content: McDonald's fast-food outlets in Australia have cut breakfast service hours as bird flu outbreaks around the country hit egg supplies.
summary: McDonald's fast-food outlets in Australia have cut breakfast service hours as bird flu outbreaks around the country hit egg supplies.

title: Opinion: Modi-Putin Should Consider Something: Balancing China Together
content: While China's calling card is its massive investments and the BRI, Russia and India can leverage their position through joint efforts towards invigorating trade and investments in Central Asia, the ASEAN region, and even South Asia.
summary: While China's calling card is its massive investments and the BRI, Russia and India can leverage their position through joint efforts towards invigorating trade and investments in Central Asia, the ASEAN region, and even South Asia.

title: Emma Navarro, Billionaire's Daughter Who Defeated Tennis Star Naomi Osaka
content: Emma Navarro is the daughter of billionaire Ben Navarro, whose $1.5 billion net worth surpasses that of Federer, Djokovic and Nadal combined.
summary: Emma Navarro is the daughter of billionaire Ben Navarro, whose $1.5 billion net worth surpasses that of Federer, Djokovic and Nadal combined.

title: Amazon Seals $1.3 Billion Deal To Build Top-Secret Cloud For Australian Military
content: Top-secret Australian military intelligence will be stored on a custom cloud server built by US tech giant Amazon, Canberra said Thursday as it unveiled the US$1.3 billion deal.
summary: Top-secret Australian military intelligence will be stored on a custom cloud server built by US tech giant Amazon, Canberra said Thursday as it unveiled the US$1.3 billion deal.

title: Biden Has Conceded, Claims Bombshell Report. White House Responds
content: The drumbeat of pressure on Joe Biden to drop out of the US presidential race intensified Wednesday with a bombshell report in the New York Times that he had conceded the possibility to a key ally.
summary: The drumbeat of pressure on Joe Biden to drop out of the US presidential race intensified Wednesday with a bombshell report in the New York Times that he had conceded the possibility to a key ally.

title: Japan Railway Unveils Humanoid Robot For Safer, Smarter Rail Maintenance
content: It resembles a malevolent robot from 1980s sci-fi but West Japan Railway's new humanoid employee was designed with nothing more sinister than a spot of painting and gardening in mind.
summary: It resembles a malevolent robot from 1980s sci-fi but West Japan Railway's new humanoid employee was designed with nothing more sinister than a spot of painting and gardening in mind.

title: What Biden Said On Reports That He's Dropping Out Of US Presidential Race
content: President Joe Biden on Wednesday asserted that he is the nominee of the Democratic Party for the November 5 presidential elections and there is no pressure on him to quit the race.
summary: President Joe Biden on Wednesday asserted that he is the nominee of the Democratic Party for the November 5 presidential elections and there is no pressure on him to quit the race.

title: Australian Missing Child's Remains Found After Suspected Crocodile Attack
content: Australian police said on Thursday it had located the remains believed to be that of a missing 12-year-old child reportedly attacked by a crocodile in the country's north.
summary: Australian police said on Thursday it had located the remains believed to be that of a missing 12-year-old child reportedly attacked by a crocodile in the country's north.

title: Indian-American Nikki Haley Jabs Journalist Over Biden's Term Prediction
content: Indian American politician Nikki Haley on Wednesday took a jibe at top American journalist George Stephanopoulos who had questioned her claim that President Joe Biden would not complete his first term.
summary: Indian American politician Nikki Haley on Wednesday took a jibe at top American journalist George Stephanopoulos who had questioned her claim that President Joe Biden would not complete his first term.

title: Japan Government Ends Use Of Floppy Disks In Bid To Modernise Bureaucracy
content: Japan's government has finally eliminated the use of floppy disks in all its systems, two decades since their heyday, reaching a long-awaited milestone in a campaign to modernise the bureaucracy.
summary: Japan's government has finally eliminated the use of floppy disks in all its systems, two decades since their heyday, reaching a long-awaited milestone in a campaign to modernise the bureaucracy.

title: Rishi Sunak: UK Conservative Leader Hoping To Defy All Predictions
content: The UK Conservatives hoped Rishi Sunak would stabilise the party and country when they made him leader following his predecessors' chaotic tenures. Instead, he has led them to the brink of electoral wipeout.
summary: The UK Conservatives hoped Rishi Sunak would stabilise the party and country when they made him leader following his predecessors' chaotic tenures. Instead, he has led them to the brink of electoral wipeout.

title: UK General Elections Live Updates: UK Votes In Historic Polls Today

title: UK Election 2024: Hour-By-Hour Guide To How The Results Come In
content: The UK votes Thursday to decide whether Labour Party leader Keir Starmer can end 14 years of opposition and win the keys to 10 Downing Street, or whether - somehow - Prime Minister Rishi Sunak can buck the polls.

title: Rishi Sunak Ramps Up Fear Factor In Last-Ditch Election Push
content: Labour leader Keir Starmer dismissed as "desperate" Rishi Sunak's last-gasp efforts to stoke fears about the opposition party winning a huge majority at Thursday's UK election.

title: In Pics: Key Faces In UK Elections 2024
